verses.verse: After <WG3326> these things <WG5023> Jesus <WG2424> showed <WG5319> himself <WG1438> again <WG3825> to the <WG3588> disciples <WG3101> at <WG1909> the <WG3588> sea <WG2281> of Tiberias; <WG5085> and <WG1161> on this wise <WG3779> showed <WG5319> he himself.

There were <WG2258> together <WG3674> Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> and <WG2532> Thomas <WG2381> called <WG3004> Didymus, <WG1324> and <WG2532> Nathanael <WG3482> of <WG575> Cana <WG2580> in Galilee, <WG1056> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> sons of Zebedee, <WG2199> and <WG2532> two <WG1417> other <WG243> of <WG1537> his <WG846> disciples. <WG3101>

Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> I go <WG5217> a fishing. <WG232> They say <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> We <WG2249> also <WG2532> go <WG2064> with <WG4862> thee. <WG4671> They went forth, <WG1831> and <WG2532> entered <WG305> into <WG1519> a ship <WG4143> immediately: <WG2117> and <WG2532> that <WG1565> night <WG3571> they caught <WG4084> nothing. <WG3762>

But <WG1161> when the morning <WG4405> was now <WG2235> come, <WG1096> Jesus <WG2424> stood <WG2476> on <WG1519> the <WG3588> shore: <WG123> but <WG3305> the <WG3588> disciples <WG3101> knew <WG1492> not <WG3756> that <WG3754> it was <WG2076> Jesus. <WG2424>
Then <WG3767> Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Children, <WG3813> have <WG2192> ye any <WG3387> meat? <WG4371> They answered <WG611> him, <WG846> No. <WG3756>

And <WG1161> he <WG3588> said <WG2036> unto them, <WG846> Cast <WG906> the <WG3588> net <WG1350> on <WG1519> the <WG3588> right <WG1188> side <WG3313> of the <WG3588> ship, <WG4143> and <WG2532> ye shall find. <WG2147> They cast <WG906> therefore, <WG3767> and <WG2532> now <WG2089> they were not able <WG2480> <WG3756> to draw <WG1670> it <WG846> for <WG575> the <WG3588> multitude <WG4128> of fishes. <WG2486>

Therefore <WG3767> that <WG1565> disciple <WG3101> whom <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> loved <WG25> saith <WG3004> unto Peter, <WG4074> It is <WG2076> the <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962> Now <WG3767> when Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> heard <WG191> that <WG3754> it was <WG2076> the <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> he girt <WG1241> his fisher's coat <WG1903> unto him, (for <WG1063> he was <WG2258> naked,) <WG1131> and <WG2532> did cast <WG906> himself <WG1438> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> sea. <WG2281>

And <WG1161> the <WG3588> other <WG243> disciples <WG3101> came <WG2064> in a little ship; <WG4142> (for <WG1063> they were <WG2258> not <WG3756> far <WG3112> from <WG575> land, <WG1093> but <WG235> as it were <WG5613> two <WG575> hundred <WG1250> cubits,) <WG4083> dragging <WG4951> the <WG3588> net <WG1350> with fishes. <WG2486>

As soon then as <WG5613> <WG3767> they were come <WG576> to <WG1519> land, <WG1093> they saw <WG991> a fire of coals <WG439> there, <WG2749> and <WG2532> fish <WG3795> laid thereon, <WG1945> and <WG2532> bread. <WG740>
Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Bring <WG5342> of <WG575> the <WG3588> fish <WG3795> which <WG3739> ye have now <WG3568> caught. <WG4084>

Simon <WG4613> Peter <WG4074> went up, <WG305> and <WG2532> drew <WG1670> the <WG3588> net <WG1350> to <WG1909> land <WG1093> full <WG3324> of great <WG3173> fishes, <WG2486> a hundred and fifty and three: <WG1540> <WG4004> <WG5140> and <WG2532> for all there were <WG5607> so many, <WG5118> yet was not <WG3756> the <WG3588> net <WG1350> broken. <WG4977>

Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto them, <WG846> Come <WG1205> and dine. <WG709> And <WG1161> none <WG3762> of the <WG3588> disciples <WG3101> durst <WG5111> ask <WG1833> him, <WG846> Who <WG5101> art <WG1488> thou? <WG4771> knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> it was <WG2076> the <WG3588> Lord. <WG2962>
Jesus <WG2424> then <WG3767> cometh, <WG2064> and <WG2532> taketh <WG2983> bread, <WG740> and <WG2532> giveth <WG1325> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> fish <WG3795> likewise. <WG3668>
This <WG5124> is now <WG2235> the third time <WG5154> that Jesus <WG2424> showed <WG5319> himself to his <WG848> disciples, <WG3101> after that he was risen <WG1453> from <WG1537> the dead. <WG3498>

So <WG3767> when <WG3753> they had dined, <WG709> Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> to Simon <WG4613> Peter, <WG4074> Simon, <WG4613> son of Jona, <WG2495> lovest <WG25> thou me <WG3165> more <WG4119> than these? He <WG5130> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Yea, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1492> that <WG3754> I love <WG5368> thee. <WG4571> He saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Feed <WG1006> my <WG3450> lambs. <WG721>

He saith <WG3004> to him <WG846> again <WG3825> the second time, <WG1208> Simon, <WG4613> son of Jona, <WG2495> lovest <WG25> thou me? He <WG3165> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Yea, <WG3483> Lord; <WG2962> thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1492> that <WG3754> I love <WG5368> thee. <WG4571> He saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Feed <WG4165> my <WG3450> sheep. <WG4263>

He saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846> the <WG3588> third time, <WG5154> Simon, <WG4613> son of Jona, <WG2495> lovest <WG5368> thou me? <WG3165> Peter <WG4074> was grieved <WG3076> because <WG3754> he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846> the <WG3588> third time, <WG5154> Lovest <WG5368> thou me? <WG3165> And <WG2532> he said <WG2036> unto him, <WG846> Lord, <WG2962> thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1097> all things; <WG3956> thou <WG4771> knowest <WG1492> that <WG3754> I love <WG5368> thee. <WG4571> Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Feed <WG1006> my <WG3450> sheep. <WG4263>

Verily, <WG281> verily, <WG281> I say <WG3004> unto thee, <WG4671> When <WG3753> thou wast <WG2258> young, <WG3501> thou girdedst <WG2224> thyself, <WG4572> and <WG2532> walkedst <WG4043> whither <WG3699> thou wouldest: <WG2309> but <WG1161> when <WG3752> thou shalt be old, <WG1095> thou shalt stretch forth <WG1614> thy <WG4675> hands, <WG5495> and <WG2532> another <WG243> shall gird <WG2224> thee, <WG4571> and <WG2532> carry <WG5342> thee whither <WG3699> thou wouldest <WG2309> not. <WG3756>

<WG1161> This <WG5124> spake <WG2036> he, signifying <WG4591> by what <WG4169> death <WG2288> he should glorify <WG1392> God. <WG2316> And <WG2532> when he had spoken <WG2036> this, <WG5124> he saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> Follow <WG190> me. <WG3427>

Then <WG1161> Peter, <WG4074> turning about, <WG1994> seeth <WG991> the <WG3588> disciple <WG3101> whom <WG3739> Jesus <WG2424> loved <WG25> following; <WG190> which <WG3739> also <WG2532> leaned <WG377> on <WG1909> his <WG846> breast <WG4738> at <WG1722> supper, <WG1173> and <WG2532> said, <WG2036> Lord, <WG2962> which <WG5101> is <WG2076> he that betrayeth <WG3860> thee? <WG4571>
Peter <WG4074> seeing <WG1492> him <WG5126> saith <WG3004> to Jesus, <WG2424> Lord, <WG2962> and <WG1161> what <WG5101> shall this man <WG3778> do?

Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto him, <WG846> If <WG1437> I will <WG2309> that he <WG846> tarry <WG3306> till <WG2193> I come, <WG2064> what <WG5101> is that to <WG4314> thee? <WG4571> follow <WG190> thou <WG4771> me. <WG3427>

Then <WG3767> went this saying abroad <WG1831> <WG3778> <WG3056> among <WG1519> the <WG3588> brethren, <WG80> that <WG3754> that <WG1565> disciple <WG3101> should not <WG3756> die: <WG599> yet <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> not <WG3756> unto him, <WG846> He shall <WG3754> not <WG3756> die; <WG599> but, <WG235> If <WG1437> I will <WG2309> that he <WG846> tarry <WG3306> till <WG2193> I come, <WG2064> what <WG5101> is that to <WG4314> thee? <WG4571>

This <WG3778> is <WG2076> the <WG3588> disciple <WG3101> which testifieth <WG3140> of <WG4012> these things, <WG5023> and <WG2532> wrote <WG1125> these things: <WG5023> and <WG2532> we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> his <WG846> testimony <WG3141> is <WG2076> true. <WG227>

And <WG1161> there are <WG2076> also <WG2532> many <WG4183> other things <WG243> which <WG3745> Jesus <WG2424> did, <WG4160> the which, <WG3748> if <WG1437> they should be written <WG1125> every one, <WG2596> <WG1520> I suppose <WG3633> that even the <WG3588> world <WG2889> itself <WG846> could not <WG3761> contain <WG5562> the <WG3588> books <WG975> that should be written. <WG1125> Amen. <WG281>
